main.name: Shreeven Kommireddy
main.description: I am a full stack engineer and I use python, node and go to develop software for the internet.
main.bio: Self-motivated and gifted at finding reliable solutions for software issues. Experienced in creating databases, RESTful API and working to build scalable high performance back-end services along with offering skills in website development, app development as well as data science. Fluent in English and Telugu, whilst learning German and Spanish. Accustomed to working with cross-cultural, global teams
main.contactmessage: Hi, if you would like to hire me or work with me, please do message me!

resume.skillmessage: Fluent in writing high scalable code in multiple languages. Proficient in developing websites, mobile apps as well as creating neural networks with high accuracies.

education.description: Learned to conccurently manage task and expand beyond the typical life of a daily student. Undertaken many projects in many different fields, learning to integrate my interdiciplinary background.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Created apps, websites and blockchain based softwares for companies across the world. Managed and lead large teams from a remote office ensuring collaboration and efficiency to ensure project completions. Wrote scalable code that is being used in deployment as well as software that increases production by 30%
